author: Glenn Scott
comment: This app is what makes having a smart watch fun. Notifications are nice but being able to change faces at will is the best feature. Love the collection feature! I like to change watch bands frequently and being able to put watch faces into collections to match my watch bands and having them load automatically is awesome! Keep up the great work.
title: Best wear app

author: John Joel
comment: Unfortunately the old message of this version is too old has returned and app now force closes

author: Tony C
comment: Excellent app a must if you enjoy having a new watch face almost every time you use it
title: Awesome
